Are you feeling bored and looking for a new game to play? Or maybe you're just a fan of classic card games? Either way, Free Spider Solitaire 2012 is a great option to consider.

## What is Free Spider Solitaire 2012?

Free Spider Solitaire 2012 is a computer game that follows the rules of classic spider solitaire. The goal of the game is to build descending sequences of cards of the same suit from King to Ace. 

What sets this game apart is its modern twist on the classic gameplay. With multiple difficulties, customizable backgrounds and card decks, and a sleek and user-friendly interface, Free Spider Solitaire 2012 is a fun game for all ages and skill levels.

## How to Play

Playing Free Spider Solitaire 2012 is easy. The game has three difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, and Hard. The Easy level uses only one suit, while the Medium level uses two and the Hard level uses all four.

Once you select your level, the game begins. To play, simply click on a card and drag it to where you want it to go. To move a sequence of cards, click on the top card and drag the entire stack. You'll need to strategically move the cards around to create descending sequences of cards of the same suit.

If you get stuck, don't worry. The game has a built-in hint system that can help you figure out your next move. And if you make a mistake, you can undo your last move or start a new game altogether.

## Customization Options

One of the best features of Free Spider Solitaire 2012 is its customization options. You can select from a variety of card backs and backgrounds to make the game your own. There are also different card deck options, including a standard deck, a holiday deck, and a special "Kids" deck.

## Conclusion

Overall, Free Spider Solitaire 2012 is a great game for anyone looking for a fun and free way to pass the time. With its classic gameplay and modern twist, customizable options, and user-friendly interface, it's a game that will keep you entertained for hours. So why not give it a try?
